Alarm Properties Dialog Box

Requires: DSC Module

In the Alarms and Events view, double-click an alarm to display this dialog box. You also can right-click an alarm in the Alarms and Events view and select Properties from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to view the properties of an alarm.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Object Name—Displays the name of the alarm.
  • Value—Displays the value of the system tree object when the alarm or event occurred.
  • Setpoint—Displays the system tree object value at which the alarm triggered.
  • Set Time—Displays the time that the alarm occurred.
  • Set User—Displays the user who triggered the alarm or event.
  • Ack Time—Displays the time when the Ack User acknowledged the alarm or event.
  • Ack User—Displays the user who acknowledged the alarm or event.
  • Clear Time—Displays the time when the Clear User cleared the alarm or event.
  • Clear User—Displays the user who cleared the alarm or event.
  • Priority—Displays the priority of the alarm.
  • Area—Displays the area to which the alarm belongs.
  • Process—Displays the LabVIEW process that generated the alarm or event.
  • Description—Displays the description of the alarm.
  • Ack Comment—Displays any comment that the Ack User entered when the Ack User acknowledged the alarm.
